column6: The mastermind behind the attacks on Nightcrawler's loved ones is revealed… And when Nightcrawler calls upon his friends for backup, the fight comes to the Jean Grey School! But torn between two worlds—his family and the X-Men—who will Nightcrawler stand by? One thing's for sure: When the dust settles, one of his worlds will be changed forever…
column8: | writer:Chris Claremont | penciller (cover):Jamie McKelvie | artist:Todd Nauck
